title: Unable to to Patch 6.16. It says "Update failed; Unspecified error occured, please check the logs
body: I really need help with this. I've been trying for days now, but it just won't update. I'm not sure what to do and a solution would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: I'm happy to help, but need some more details!  The patcher is doing different things depending on where you're at.  At what percent are you receiving this error?  Do you have a screenshot?  Let me know!

Thank you. And well, the first time I tried updating, the error showed up before it could get to any percent. And now, when I do it, it automatically goes to 33% and stays there for a little while and then the error pops up again. I've been trying for the past few days. I can try to post a screenshot when the error happens again though.

At 33 percent, the patcher is attempting to update and download game files.  An issue with your network can lose connection to our patching servers, and result in this error.  As a first step, I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This should get you fixed up!
Hello, My friend is getting the same thing at different times he gets it at 1 - 10% and then it gives him the error message

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EA5iKOY6,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-12T22:18:52.035+0000)
>
> At 33 percent, the patcher is attempting to update and download game files.  An issue with your network can lose connection to our patching servers, and result in this error.  As a first step, I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This should get you fixed up!

Hey, thank you so much for helping! I stopped trying to update it for at least an hour and now I tried and its working! Its now at 88% and still going! This is so great thank you for directing me to the right place. I appreciate it greatly :)
Mines working too!
Hey! I went over to the connection issues guide and downloaded the hextech repair tool, but nothing seems to be fixed. :(

when my computer is patching it stops at 95 percent and shows unspecified error and then if i opened the league again it will patch again and if it reach 95 again it will show error again please help i need to play league of legends!!!
This fixed it for me i just deleated the contents in the file lol_air_client --> realeases --> 0.0.1.230 and it fixed it for me
How do you find "lol_air_client" files?

Rito can confirm? I tried deleting it and it ended up being like gigabytes worth. I canceled and wondered if it was important shit I was deleting because a stranger said it would fix my problem. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
i get this error now pls help me i don't know why i patch it then it work than after a 30 min i turn on my pc again andi get a fichier scan at 33% and i wait then i get this error pls help me :/

check it out it works 100%
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues
Same with my friend, it got to 99 percent then crashed so he restarted, then it got to about 5 percent then the update failed occured again

I am having the same error but the game isnt updating anything i had it open and then it says lol client has quit then i cant open my game because it says i have an unspecified error. please check the logs for more info.
like sometimes it works but then my gaem crashes and it happens again

So, I'm having the same problem, however, according to my logs my problem starts as soon as the patcher finishes scanning the game files but starts updating. Here is the lines in the log, with some personal info removed, where it failed:

Ok guys i just fixed it. it happened to me and i tried to delete lol air rads or something but it didnt work....
what you do is instead to pressing retry you press [x] :) hope it works for u
Is it just the button x?
{{champion:103}}

I am having a similar problem, I just reinstalled the game onto a computer and the launcher will open and it will say calculationg differences 1 files scanned. Then after a while it will fail and then close. Afterwards a bugsplat will appear. I've literally tried everything anyone help?
Hi Porocles I try ed to use the connection issues idea but it didn't work and it won't pass 37 please help. : (

While searching there, I discovered that I didn't have the latest version of Windows. I figured that  that was the issue. But, its still continuing to do the same things after I updated it. I have a screenshot but I'm not sure how to post it.
Update failed; Unspecified error occured, please check the logs what should i do
